item.title: What is the bonus history of Pro Fin Capital?
item.description: Pro Fin Capital's most recent bonus was a 1:1 issue announced for January 2, 2026, following a 2:1 bonus issued on April 29, 2022. The company has a history of rewarding shareholders through bonus issues. Time: 52 minutes ago

item.title: Lupin Added to Mojo Stocks: A Strategic Inclusion Backed by Robust Financials
item.description: Lupin, a leading large-cap pharmaceutical company, has been added to the prestigious Mojo Stocks list as of 31 December 2025, reflecting its robust financial performance and strategic fit within the Pharmaceuticals & Biotechnology sector. This inclusion underscores Lupin’s strong fundamentals, impressive quarterly growth, and attractive valuation metrics, making it a compelling choice for investors seeking exposure to quality pharma stocks with sustainable growth prospects. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: DDev Plastiks Industries Ltd Forms Death Cross Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: DDev Plastiks Industries Ltd, a small-cap player in the Specialty Chemicals sector, has recently formed a Death Cross, a technical pattern where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development signals a potential shift towards a bearish trend, raising concerns about the stock’s near-term momentum and long-term strength. Time: 5 hours ago
